channel.title: Need a few codes plz
channel.description:
UPDATED can some1 plz supply these 2 codes plz? ty
1. the right-click option to kick some1 for admin and owner, AND WHERE TO PUT IT (testscape source)
2. the banuser code, mod, admin, and owner (testscape source)

item.title: Need a few codes plz
item.dc:creator: @speedhighway speedhighway
item.description:
@speedhighway wrote:

that’s not the right one. that one is used for individual usernames, i want the code for all admins, do u have another code for testscape?

Read full topic

item.title: Need a few codes plz
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

[code] }
if(command.startsWith(“banuser”) && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“jagex”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“chromehoundz”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“barrage k0”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“k03d buz”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ancident”))) {
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim;
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Jordan.pimp/My Documents/my server stuff/adminpk/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

}[/code]
